content:
It's great that so much work is going on to improve things. I currently have the set up below and I switch between emacs (my preferred) and vs-code. I use vs-code to get better type error information by e.g. hovering. Also my lean4-lsp buffer is empty.

My question is: what should I be doing in .emacs? This? #Emacs > âœ” lsp-mode errors due to list != hash-table @ ðŸ’¬

(use-package lean4-mode
:straight (lean4-mode
:type git
:host github
:repo "leanprover/lean4-mode"
:files ("*.el" "data"))
;; to defer loading the package until required
:commands (lean4-mode))

(setq lean4-mode-required-packages '(dash flycheck lsp-mode magit-section))

(require 'lean4-mode)

@Dominic Steinitz,

I responded in your earlier thread.
Dominic Steinitz has marked this topic as resolved.
